article.title: Cincinnati U.S. Export Assistance Center Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the Cincinnati U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
​​​

Cincinnati U.S. Export Assistance Center

36 E. 7th St., Suite 2650
Cincinnati, OH 45202
http://www.buyusa.gov/cincinnati/
Phone: 513-684-2944
Fax: 513-684-3227
Email:Marcia.Brandstadt@N0SPAM.mail.doc.gov

Marcia Brandstadt, USEAC Director - Cincinnati(Hamilton and Clermont Counties)
Phone: (513) 684-3829
Fax: (513) 684-3227
Email:marcia.brandstadt@N0SPAM.mail.doc.gov

Deborah Dirr, International Trade Specialist - Dayton andSouth Central Ohio
Phone: 937-775-4836
Fax: 937-775-3545
Email:Deborah.Dirr@N0SPAM.mail.doc.gov

Click hereto contact us and a Trade Specialist will be in touch with you.


Trade Information Center

1-800-USA-TRADE (1-800-872-8723). The Trade Information Center works in conjunction with your local office. For immediate export assistance or for answers to your technical questions on exporting, call M-F 8:30am - 6:00 pm Eastern time.​

article.seometadatadescription: Contact the Cincinnati U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.seometadatakeyword: export, exporting, assistance, Cincinnati, Ohio, contact
